Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
This is the name of a unit.

“In life, you rejected me. Now, you’re Drained. You will serve me. Cling to those not yet consumed by oblivion. In life, you sapped me with tiresome, trivial demands. What motivates you now, dearest Mother? Regret? The fact that you succumbed to Es’Teq is evidence of your faithlessness. I will put your hovering husk to good use collecting the vitality of others unworthy of the gift of life. Those who squander life will be made subservient. Are they not all unworthy? If it were not so, they would not fall.”[br/]– High Lord Merritt Tarksun, “RV-84575R: Requiem Decreed”

“你的一生都在排斥我。现在，你被抽尽了精华，将为我服务。紧紧抓住那些还未被遗忘吞没的人吧。你在一生中用繁琐的要求折磨我。我最亲爱的母亲啊，现在是什么在推动着你？是后悔吗？你屈服于埃斯特克的事实证实了你的不忠。我将好好利用你空荡的躯壳，收集那些不配获得生命馈赠之人的活力。浪费生命之人将会屈从于我。他们都是不配拥有之人吗？没错，因为如果不是那样的话，他们就不会堕落。”[br/]- 至尊领主梅里特·塔克森，“RV-84575R：安魂曲教令”

This is a unit description. I.e. a bit of flavor text about the unit that gives an insight into the lore of the game. This takes the form of a quote - from a book, diary, journal, etc - followed by the source. A lot of them try to get across some of the humor Triumph is known for.
This is the name of a unit.

“The Heritor Dynasty is a pyramid scheme best left buried in the past. Es’Teq extends life, by draining it. They created dogmas to justify it. Every believer gave a little. Unsustainable incentives went to faithful adopters. Once everyone was hooked, it became clear: to live forever, more vitality was needed. Then Siphoners appeared, punishing unbelievers and undesirables. Once weaponized, those with money and power got essence indulgences. Sure, they wrapped it in religion, but it was no more virtuous than the Syndicate. The desire to live forever creates empires of monsters and always will.”[br/]– Mah Reg’Nib, “RV-98034X: Running from Monsters”

“继承者王朝就是一个金字塔式的骗局，最好让它继续被过去埋葬。埃斯特克人能够延长生命，然而方式却是汲取生命，他们甚至创造了教条来为自己辩护。每一位信徒都奉献了一些生命，这些不可持续的激励都到了忠诚的接受者那里。当所有人都上钩了，就变得明晰起来：想要获得永生，就需要更多生命力。于是，生命汲取者出现了，他们会惩罚那些没有信仰或不愿信仰之人。在获得了武器之后，那些有钱有势的人便对精华染上了特殊的癖好。当然，他们会用宗教来包装这一切，但这并不比辛迪加人高尚到哪里去。对永生的渴望创造了这些怪物帝国，并且将永远这样下去。”[br/]- 玛·瑞格尼布，“RV-98034X：逃离虎口”

This is a unit description. I.e. a bit of flavor text about the unit that gives an insight into the lore of the game. This takes the form of a quote - from a book, diary, journal, etc - followed by the source. A lot of them try to get across some of the humor Triumph is known for.
This is the name of a unit.

“Originally, Heritors were peaceful. We shared our vitality, surrounding their Quintessence Arks willingly to heal our most afflicted. Their miraculous Es’Teq promised us eternal lives. We were equals, thriving for generations. Then their High Lord rose to power. It wasn’t enough just to live. He demanded deeper devotion. Essence became power. Power required control. The vitality we shared went to those deemed worthiest. Communion became forced servitude. My husband was drained to death, and for what purpose? A happy life no longer matters. Their self-righteous pride drained us all of life.”[br/]– Morris Maunery, “RV-838899R: Testimonial: Heritor Purge Initiative”

“最初，继承者是爱好和平的。我们围绕着他们的精髓方舟，一同分享着生命力，治愈我们的苦痛。他们不可思议的埃斯特克许诺给予我们永恒的生命。我们维持着平等，世世代代都繁荣昌盛，直到他们的至尊领主掌握了大权。光是活着还远远不够，他要求更多的奉献。精华变成了力量，而力量需要掌控。我们本来共同所拥有的活力被送往那些被视为值得之人。通灵变成了一种强制性的劳役。我的丈夫被吸取精华至死，但是为了什么？幸福的生活已经不再重要了。他们自以为是的骄傲吸尽了我们所有的生命。”[br/]- 莫里斯·莫纳里，“RV-838899R：证明书：继承者净化计划”

This is a unit description. I.e. a bit of flavor text about the unit that gives an insight into the lore of the game. This takes the form of a quote - from a book, diary, journal, etc - followed by the source. A lot of them try to get across some of the humor Triumph is known for.
This is the name of a unit.

“We entered the sanctum, stepping over the husks of fallen bodies. Taskmaster’s men donned hazmat suits, assuming a plague. I knew better. Zealots gave their lives for what slept within. Despite my protests, they broke the seals. A man floated before them, encased in emerald. His ageless eyes opened. Virulent tendrils sapped the workers of life, nourishing the High Lord. The Taskmaster’s weapons deflected off its recharging carapace. A blast of entropic energy caused all mechanical devices to fall inert. I watched with concealed horror as Taskmaster’s corpse bowed with lifeless eyes before this Heritor nightmare.”[br/]– Mah Reg’Nib, “RV-97009X: Running from Monsters”

“我们走进圣殿，脚下是一具具变为了空壳的尸体。为了防止瘟疫，工头的手下们全都穿着防护服。我比他们要清楚得多。这些狂热者为了里面沉睡的东西献出了自己的生命。尽管我一再反对，但他们还是打开了封印，一个浑身包裹在绿宝石中的男人漂浮着出现在了他们面前。接着，他睁开了自己永不衰老的眼睛。恶毒的触须吸走了工人们的生命，滋养着至尊领主。工头的武器射偏在了充能外壳上，一阵混沌能量的爆发使所有的机械装置都失去了作用。我看见工头的尸体瞪着毫无生气的眼睛跪倒在这位继承者梦魇面前。我的内心充满了恐惧，但却不敢表露出来。”[br/]- 玛·瑞格尼布，“RV-97009X：逃离虎口”
